entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @thedailybeast I’m afraid if CNN or MSNBC is airing information on the Coronavirus pertaining to POTUS more than half the country will ignore.  They have been pretty obvious in the past of misreporting, fabricating news that’s detrimental to POTUS and no longer have ANY credability. Fake News!
